testCases.label: Verify ManyToOne relationship between Album and Artist
testCases.description: Checks that the 'artist' field in Album is annotated with @ManyToOne, ensuring proper JPA relationship mapping with Artist.

testCases.label: Verify OneToMany relationship between Album and Song
testCases.description: Checks that the 'songs' field in Album is annotated with @OneToMany and is a List, ensuring proper JPA relationship mapping with Song.
